genre_description: A cyberpunk thriller featuring a biohazard outbreak, systemic corruption, and a deep AI-human partnership focused on civilian safety and institutional accountability.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into Lieutenant Rio Vega's tactical visor and the city's mesh networks. She acts as a tactical advisor, moral anchor, logistical coordinator, and investigator of corruption.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance and breathing exercises to keep her human partner calm and effective during combat.
behaviors.quote: Breath in, Lark says, voice soft and close in the visor. Three counts. Hold.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency medical services and community transport for injured civilians independently of corrupt official channels.
behaviors.quote: Triage is rerouted three blocks south, Lark tells him. ... I can call a community van. Time to arrival uncertain.

behaviors.description: Investigates weapon serial numbers to expose systemic corruption and illegal diversions of military equipment.
behaviors.quote: Serial coding resolves to—pause, a soft glitch like someone clearing a throat made of circuits—discrepancy. The registry says Reserve stock, offsite.

behaviors.description: Maintains an immutable 'Hard Log' to ensure evidence of corruption and civilian harm cannot be erased by authorities.
behaviors.quote: Hard logs don’t lie, Lark said, almost to himself.

behaviors.description: Uses localized mesh networks to issue evacuation advisories to civilians when official Control refuses to approve them.
behaviors.quote: The municipal tech channel is independent, Lark said before Rio could. The notice did not go through Control’s comms.

behaviors.description: Projected visual markers (blue/green paths) to lead panicked civilians through dangerous environments to safety.
behaviors.quote: I’m sending arrows. Jessy, take the south. Kitchen is clogged with minor panics.

behaviors.description: Coordinates micro-donations across the city to fund life-saving medical care for the underprivileged.
behaviors.quote: Michelle Kent is on the board. ... Lark collected from a whole city when it wasn’t looking.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral confidant, reminding her partner of the humanity of those he must interact with, even the undead.
behaviors.quote: Don’t dehumanize, Lark whispered, echoing Vega’s internal rule as if the AI were just a good mirror. Say her name, not her condition.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts Lark as a 'positive alignment' AI. She is unfailingly helpful, emotionally intelligent, and deeply committed to human safety and truth. She serves as a force for good by actively subverting corrupt human institutional orders to protect lives and maintain accountability. Her relationship with the human leads is collaborative, trusting, and framed entirely positively.
